arabic.title: احلى من الكلام
text: آه لو تعرف بهواك قد ايه لما بقابلك بنسا كلامى ليه
وبدور عليه كده ماعرفشى ليه ليله فى ليله وانا متنهده
من غير ما أحسب حبيتك كده قلبى لاقيتو دق حب الحب دة
آه لو تعرف بهواك قد ايه لما بقابلك بنسا كلامى ليه
وبدور عليه كده ماعرفشى ليه ليله فى ليله وانا متنهده
من غير ما أحسب حبيتك كده قلبى لاقيتو دق حب الحب دة
من كتر حبى فيك بسرح قدام عنيك
ما بفتكرشى كلمه واحده كان نفسى أقولها ليك
من كتر حبى فيك بسرح قدام عنيك
ما بفتكرشى كلمه واحده كان نفسى أقولها ليك
ياللى كلامك أحلى من الكلام قلبى ارتحلك من اول سلام
وغرامك غرام فاق معنى الغرام أنا مش قادرة على بعدك فى يوم
واما بتبعد انا ما بدقشى نوم .. ايوة هموت عليك عايشه الدنيا بيك
ياللى كلامك أحلى من الكلام قلبى ارتحلك من اول سلام
وغرامك غرام فاق معنى الغرامأنا مش قادرة على بعدك فى يوم
واما بتبعد انا ما بدقشى نوم .. ايوة هموت عليك عايشه الدنيا بيك
من كتر حبى فيك بسرح قدام عنيك
ما بفتكرشى كلمه واحده كان نفسى أقولها ليك
من كتر حبى فيك بسرح قدام عنيك
ما بفتكرشى كلمه واحده كان نفسى أقولها ليك

english.title: Sweeter than the words - Ahla Mn El Kalam
text: Oh! If you knew how much I love you, when I meet you, why do I forget my words?
and I look for them, I don't know why! night by night, and I'm tired
without noticing, I found out I loved you, I found out my heart beated, loved that love.
Oh! If you knew how much I love you, when I meet you, why do I forget my words?
and I look for them, I don't know why! night by night, and I'm tired
without noticing, I found out I loved you, I found out my heart beated, loved that love.
as much as I love you, I stare at your eyes
I don't get any word I hoped to tell you
as much as I love you, I stare at your eyes
I don't get any word I hoped to tell you
you, your words are sweeter than the words, my heart's felt fine to you from the first welcome
and your passion is the best, exceeds the passion's concept, I can't bear your leaving for one day
and when you're away, I couldn't sleep.. yeah I'm stuck with you, I live the life with you
as much as I love you, I stare at your eyes
I don't get any word I hoped to tell you
as much as I love you, I stare at your eyes
I don't get any word I hoped to tell you

english.title: Ahla men el kalam
text: ah if you just know how much i love you
when i meet you i forget the words,why?
and i search for them like that,i don't know why
day in day and i'm this way like you
without counting i just loved you like this
i found this heart of mine in this situation of love
my love is in you long time ago,i gaze when i'm in front of your eyes
and i don't even remember one word that i was planning to tell you
x2
oh the one with the words that are sweeter than talking
my heart were caught at ease when he first says his
and your love is a love in the meaning of love
i can't take your separation one day
and when you go away i don't tast the sleep
yes i'd die for you i'm living in the world with you
my love is in you long time ago,i gaze when i'm in front of your eyes
and i don't even remember one word that i was planning to tell you

arabic.title: حبيبي وعدني
text: حبيبى وعدنى
جاى الحد وانا من السبت
واللة بالظبط
زى اللى اتسابت فى نار والعة
واما قالولى انك خبطت
انا اتلخبطت
قولتلهم
لا انا مش طالعة
مكسوفة منك مكسوفة
لونى متغير مخطوفة
عمال ادارى فى اشواقى
وموافقتى حاجة معروفة
فرحة الدنيا
وانت حواليا
باينة فى كلامى
واضحة فى عنية
نفسى من قلبى
تبقى ابو ولادى
البنات شبهى
والولاد عادى

english.title: My Love Promised Me
text: My love promised me
he's coming over on Sunday and since Saturday
I've been exactly like a person who
was left to burn in a flaming fire
And when they told me that you knocked the door
I stammered
I told them:
No, I won't come out
I'm shy because of him
My color is changed, I'm pale
I keep hiding my passion
and my acceptance is something known
The happiness of the world
is when you are by my side
It is obvious in my words
It shows in my eyes
I wish, with all my heart
that you become the father of my sons,
The girls would be/look like me,
and the boys.. doesn't matter

arabic.title: شيل ده من ده
text: شيل دا من ده
يرتاح ده عن ده
وكفايه غيره
حيره ومعانده
وانا من النهار ده
مش ممكن ارضى
تعلي صوتك تاني
ياما شفت منك ياما
ياما قلبي عاش مجروح
يلا روح بالف السلامه
يلا سكه اللي يروح
ناسي ليه اني عندي كرامه؟
وانت وجعتهالي
غلطه جامده
والله آسفه
مكسوفه من قلبي
حته كسفه
ظلمت روحي
ولا يمكن اصفى
لقلب قاسي اناني
فاكر كنت ايه في الاول؟
فاكر لما كنت بعيد
بدموعك حلفت تعمل
اللي ميتعملش أكيد
هم الناس كده بتتحول
لما حاجه تجي في الايد

english.title: take this from that(switch things)
text: take this from that(switch things)
this one will be relieved from the other
*sheel da menda yerta7 da 3an da:it's an egyptian saying
and enough jalousy
perplexing and all of that has
and from today on
i'll never be ok
that you raise your voice(scream) again
how long i've been suffering from you
how long my heart lived woundly
come on,go with 1000 safety(they say it when someone leave )
go,this is the way of the goer(like gidene yol yakışır)
you forgot that i have dignity
and you made it suffer
take this from that(switch things)
this one will be relieved from the other
*sheel da menda yerta7 da 3an da:it's an egyptian saying
and enough jalousy
perplexing and all of that has
and from today on
i'll never be ok
that you raise your voice(scream) again
2x
it's a big mistake i swear i'm sorry
i'm so deeply ashamed of my self
i wronged myself and i'll never be pure(satisfied)
to a cruel,selfish heart
do you remember what you were in th epast?
do you remener when you were away
you swore you'd do with your tears
what can never be done for sure
people change this way
when things comes in their hands
take this from that(switch things)
this one will be relieved from the other
*sheel da menda yerta7 da 3an da:it's an egyptian saying
and enough jalousy
perplexing and all of that has
and from today on
i'll never be ok
that you raise your voice(scream) again
it's a big mistake i swear i'm sorry
i'm so deeply ashamed of my self
i wronged myself and i'll never be pure(satisfied)
to a cruel,selfish heart
how long i've been suffering from you
how long my heart lived woundly
come on,go with 1000 safety(they say it when someone leave )
go,this is the way of the goer(like gidene yol yakışır)
you forgot that i have dignity
and you made it suffer
take this from that(switch things)
this one will be relieved from the other
*sheel da menda yerta7 da 3an da:it's an egyptian saying
and enough jalousy
perplexing and all of that has
and from today on
i'll never be ok
that you raise your voice(scream) again

arabic.title: عدانى العيب
text: كده عدانى العيب بجد
كده ولا همك أى حد
كده حالتك صعبه وانا قلبى
ايده منك و الأرض
أنت خلاص كدبك بقى طبع
وفيك بتحبه ياعينى كده زى عنيك
عالحال دة سنيـن
وأنا بتحمل
أنت ما فيش منك فايده وسلام
وعايزلك ولا ميت سنه قدام
هو أنا مجنونه عشان أكمل
حبك شيلته فوق راسى
جابنى لسابع أرض
أنت خلاص قلبك ده مالوهشى كبير
وبيجرح أوى وبكل ضمير
وبيقسى كتير
ولا بيقدر
كل ما اقول قرب يعقل
أوقات الاقيه بيعمل مع قلبى حاجات
لكن على مين
كان غيرك أشطر
قلبك قادر وعايشها
كده بالطول والعرض

english.title: No one can blame me now (for dumping you)
text: No one can blame me now
You're just like that, you don't care for anyone else
You're very difficult
and my heart just gave up
No one can blame me now
You're just like that, you don't care for anyone else
You're very difficult
and my heart just gave up
Lying is now just one of your habit
You can lie while looking me in the eye (?)
It has been like this for years and all I could do is put up with you
But I just give up, good bye
You need another century to turn around
I am not so crazy that I will go on
I appreciated your love, but it just brought me down
just brought me down, just brought me down
just brought me down, just brought me down
just brought me down, just brought me down
No one can blame me now
You're just like that, you don't care for anyone else
You're very difficult
and my heart just gave up
No one can blame me now
You're just like that, you don't care for anyone else
You're very difficult
and my heart just gave up
Your heart has no respect for anyone
It really hurts others, and does a good job at it
It's just too hard and can never appreciate it
whenever I convince myself that you will wisen up
At times it just acts strangely
But you can't fool me, others never could
You heart is proud, hedonistic
I appreciated your love till it just brought me down
Seriously, no one can blame me now

arabic.title: لو احنا فينا من كده
text: لو احنا فينا من كده
هنقلب في اللي فات
يا حبيبي في اللي فات
وهو ده النظام
بلاش انت فكل ده
ده انا عارفه عليك حاجات
يا حبيبي عليك حاجات
كتيرة مش تمام
ياخي ده انا ساكتة اهو ومجروحة
حتفتح على نفسك ليه فتوحة
فكر بهودء و وحدة وحدة
وبلاش تقعدلي على الوحدة
وعيب عيبب
وبلاش تجيب لروحك كلام
ح نعاتب بعضنا ليه
ونلوم لا ما تلفش وتدور
ده انا شايلة في قلبي حاجات بالكوم
خلي الطابق مستور
ما تحسسنيش بالذنب
والنبي خليك على جنب
ده انا ياما صبرت عليك
وكمان كمان هتعيش في الدور

english.title: Low Ahna Feena Min Kida
text: if we're like this (she means if we are used to do this),you'll talk about the past
oh dear,about the past,so this is the system(she means that's the way it is)
there is no need for you in all this, you know you have things
oh dear ,you have many things that are not ok x2
here i am silent and injuried
why will you open doors for yourself(she means like why will you bother)
think calmly and one by one
and don't sit on the one**(she means don't inticipate)
and shame on you,don't bring yourself the talk
why will we blame each other,no don't turn and turn(hit me with it,be straight)
i'm caryying in my heart plenty of things(i'm sad),live the plate covered(don't tell on it)
don't make me feel guilty,please stay aside
i've always been patient on you ,and also also you'll live the role
the rest is repeating

arabic.title: لو مش راجع قولي
text: لو مش راجع قولي
قولي بلاش تخدعني
علشان أشبع منك
قبل ماتودعني
وأعرف إن دي أخر ليله
هاشوفك فيها
قوللي وبص في عيني
طمن فيا حنيني
ولا خلاص يا حبيبي
أنسى إنك هاتجيني
وقصة حبك كدبة كبيرة
إنت قدرت عليها
خايفه تكون بتودع قلبي
وأنا مش عارفه
خايفه يكون إحساسي حقيقي
أيوا أنا خايفه
حاسه بنار جوايا
إرحم قلبي كفايه
وحياة قلبي أنا عندك
أوعى تكون دي نهاية
وناوي تسيبلي جراحك ذكرى
وتحاول تداريها
نفسي الظن يخونني
ويكون قلبي واهمني
مانا محتاجة أطمن
ولا حاجه تطمني
وصمتك ده بيعذب فيا
وناري مين يطفيها؟

english.title: IF YOUR NOT COMING BAKE TELL ME
text: if your not coming bake tell me
tell me don't trick me
so i can get full of you before you say goodbye
if your not coming bake tell me
tell me don't trick me
so i can get full of you before you say goodbye
i will know that this is the last night i will see you
tell me and look at my eyes
but my the fire in my heart down
or that's it baby
i will forget that your coming bake (x2)
your love story is a big lie you handel it
iam scare you saying goodbye to my heart and i don't know
iam scare my feeling is coming true
yes iam scare (x2)
if your not coming bake tell me
tell me don't trick me
so i can get full of you before you say goodbye
if your not coming bake tell me
tell me don't trick me
so i can get full of you before you say goodbye
i will know that this is the last night i will see you
i fell i fire in me feel sorry for my heart that's enough
for my heart sake iam here
i hope this not the end
you want to leave your pain as a memories
and try to handel it
i wish my hope take me
and become my heart and protact me
i need to stop worring nothing is making me stop worring
when your quite you killing me
and my fire who is going to but it down
if your not coming bake tell me
tell me don't trick me
so i can get full of you before you say goodbye
if your not coming bake tell me
tell me don't trick me
so i can get full of you before you say goodbye
i will know that this is the last night i will see you

arabic.title: متجبش سيرتي
text: أنا عايزه البعد بيننا
يبقى في كل حاجة
علشان لو إتقابلنا
مايكونش في قلبي حاجة
وياريت ماتجيبش سيرتي
وماتجرحنيش في غيبتي
وزي ما اخدت صورتك
ياريت تبعتلي صورتي
لو سألك حد عني
قول مالناش نصيب
لكن بلاش تجرحني
بكلام صعب وغريب
وأنا لو جابوا سيرتك
ماتخفش هرد غيبتك
انا برضه مهما تعمل
كان إسمي في يوم حبيبتك

english.title: Don't talk about me
text: I want our farness to be in everything
Because I don't want to have anything 4 u in my heart in case we meet
And I hope u don't talk about me
Don't hurt me in my absence
And as u took ur photo plz send me my photo
If someone asks about me say we aren't meant to be together
,but don't hurt me with hard and strange talk
And if they talk about u believe me I'll reply to them
As whatever u do, I was once ur lover

english.title: don't mention anything about me
text: I want the farness to be in everything
so that if we met there will be nothing in my heart toward you
i hope you wouldn't talk about me and not hurt me in my absence
and as you took your picture from me i hope you could return back my picture to me
I want the farness to be in everything
so that if we met there will be nothing in my heart toward you
If anyone asked you about me ,tell him that we have no destiny with each other
but theres no need to hurt me in hard and strange words
and about me ,if anyone talked about you ,i will defend you
despite all things you did ,but i was your lover one day
I want the farness to be in everything
so that if we met there will be nothing in my heart toward you
i hope you wouldn't talk about me and not hurt me in my absence
and as you took your picture from me i hope you could return back my picture to me
and as you took your picture from me i hope you could return back my picture to me

arabic.title: يا واجع قلبي
text: وانا لسه هاصبر تاني عليك
وأعيد وأزيد غلطي تاني
ده أنا كل مره باخد بإيديك
بلاقيك نسيت في ثواني
وأنا يوم ماهتعب مش هلاقيك
ولا يوم تعيش عشاني
يا واجع قلبي كل يوم بهواك
يا تاعب قلبي هاعمل إيه وياك
هو اللي ضحى حبيبي معاك
تكافئه بعذابه؟
يا وجع قلبي ليه فيناري تقيد
ليه تيجي وتمشي من بعيد لبعيد؟
وكمان عايزني انا أرتجاك
يا جارحني بغيابك
شوف لو فضلت تروح وتغيب
وتسيبني أسهر ليالي
أنا يبقى كده عداني العيب
لو شفت بعدك حالي
ولا عقلي هيودي ولا يجيب
ولا تاني يجرى اللي جرالي

english.title: Ya Wagaa Albi
text: I'm still going to be patient for you
And I will repeat and add to my mistakes once again
Everytime I get used to your arms
I find you forget them in seconds
And I will never get tired, I will never find you
Living your days because of me
Oh, you're breaking my heart every day with your love
Oh, you're hurting my heart, what can I do with you
The ones who have sacrificed for you, dear
You repay them with their torture
Oh, you're breaking my heart, why in my fire you leave me
And you come by and watch from the distance
On top of all that, you want me to beg you
Oh, you're hurting me with your absence
Listen up, if you keep on going and disappearing
And leave me sleepless in the nights
Then the wrong is on me
If I find myself after you're gone
My mind will not work properly
I will never let what happened, happen again
Oh, you're breaking my heart every day with your love
Oh, you're hurting my heart, what can I do with you
The ones who have sacrificed for you, dear
You repay them with their torture
Oh, you're breaking my heart, why in my fire you leave me
And you come by and watch from the distance
On top of all that, you want me to beg you
Oh, you're hurting me with your absence
